Forced since retreating the bishop allows black to play Nf6 chasing the Queen off and gaining the initiative and probably the advantage.

A somewhat logical move since the pawn is taken with check, but after the knight covers the king black can not both take my bishop and protect his own. Better is simply taking 6. ... Kxg8 and after 7.d3 aim to play g6, d6 and trying to defend the position.
Black has no time for pawn-grabbing, however tempting. Black needs to develop desperately, so 9. ... Nc6 seems logical.
